https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wLLeGnJXUh9IQuMaBAPw8TuE5Rw.jpg Reencounter with a myth. 40 years since Georg Stefan Troller reported from his adopted home in "Pariser Journal," he returns to his old haunts. A journey through time in a city of contradictions that is always reinventing itself. Days and Nights in Paris
